changeExtension

static void changeExtension(java.io.File file, java.lang.String newExtension)
Change the extension of a file, based off of the period extension notation.
throws:
IOException If the system is unable to rename the file
Parameters:
file - the file that you would like to change the extension of
newExtension - The extension that you would like to change it to

concatenateStreams

void concatenateStreams(java.io.Reader[] readers, java.io.File outputFile)
Take a bunch of readers (files or otherwise) and concatenate their input together into one output file.
throws:
IOException if any problems occur during reading, writing, or concatenation
Parameters:
readers - the readers to concatenate together
outputFile - the output file to write to

throws:

Parameters:

to - The expected file to write to
